card.name: Clash of Ego
card.text: Choose one — • Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the other into your graveyard. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Intrepid Exile
card.text: As long as there are four or more card types among cards exiled with this creature, it gets +1/+1 and has flying. {W}: Exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: Itotia's Sentry
card.text: Prototype {1}{R} — 1/1 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.) {T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to each opponent. Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap this creature.

card.name: Jaguar-Frame Sync
card.text: Creature spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.) You can't cast noncreature, nonartifact spells.

card.name: Persistent Zabin
card.text: This creature can't block. You may cast this card from your graveyard by binding a creature you control in addition to this spell's other costs. (Turn it face down. It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other types and abilities.)

card.name: Weaver of the Primordial
card.text: When this creature enters, for each player, bind up to one target permanent they control. (Turn it face down. It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other types and abilities.) Whenever you tap a permanent for {C}, add an additional {C}.

card.name: Beach Day
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, draw a card if you activated two or more nonmana abilities this turn. {1}{W}{U}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Free-for-All Event
card.text: You may choose a scalebond from among creatures you control. When you do, each of those creatures deal damage equal to their power to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. (A scalebond consists of a Human creature and a non-Human creature.)

card.name: Kiana, Corpo Racer
card.text: [+1]: You may choose a scalebond from among creatures you control. If you do, until end of turn, whenever one of those creatures deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. (A scalebond consists of a Human creature and a non-Human creature.) [-2]: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token. [-6]: You get an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of target creature you control."

card.name: Reef Racer
card.text: Haste {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn. This ability costs {2} less to activate if this creature entered this turn. Dash {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.)

card.name: Snaggle, Reigning Champ
card.text: Menace Whenever Snaggle attacks, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You may pay life equal to that card's mana value. If you do, repeat this process. Otherwise, each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.

card.name: Soaring Leatherwing
card.text: Flash Flying When this creature enters, choose one— • Another target permanent you control gains indestructible until end of turn. • You may return another target permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fifth Street Faire
card.text: Discard a card, then draw two cards. Create a tapped Treasure token.

card.name: His Thousand Arms
card.text: Flying When this creature enters, choose one— • Return another target creature to its owner's hand. • Exile target artifact or enchantment. Evoke {G}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

card.name: His Withering Gaze
card.text: Menace Other creatures get -2/-2. Evoke {1}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)

card.name: Midnight Communion
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card, then mill two cards. Tap seven untapped permanents you control, exile Midnight Communion: Exile any number of cards from your graveyard, then shuffle your graveyard into your library. Draw a card.

card.name: Noah Kingsley
card.text: Tap three untapped permanents you control: Put your choice of counter on Noah Kingsley from among +1/+1, first strike, flying, vigilance, and lifelink. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Watch the End
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Watch the End, tap four untapped permanents you control. Destroy all creatures.

card.name: Vampire SSC
card.text: Lifelink

card.name: Brazen Turncoat
card.text: When this creature enters, draw a card. At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose another target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Crimson Fleet Cutthroat
card.text: Trample, haste If a creature you control attacking or dealing combat damage to a player or planeswalker would cause a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Might of Orazca
card.text: Choose target creature you control, then choose one — • That creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature. • Destroy target noncreature, nonland permanent with mana value less than that creature's power.

card.name: Miralda's Tithe
card.text: Sacrament {B} (You may cast this spell for its sacrament cost if a creature died under your control this turn or by sacrificing one as an additional cost.) Each opponent exiles the creature they control with the greatest mana value among creatures and they control.

card.name: Queen's Bay Admiral
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink that's tapped and attacking. Vengeance (When this creature dies with no decayed counters, return it to the battlefield with one. It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)

card.name: Saint Elenda of Garrano
card.text: Lifelink Whenever a non-Vampire creature you control enters, you may sacrifice it. If you do, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

card.name: Embittered Flenser
card.text: Whenever a non-Skeleton creature you control dies, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token. If this is the third time this ability has resolved this turn, each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Flourishing Sporecap
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. {1}{WU}, {T}: Scry 1. {2}{BR}, {T}: Flourishing Sporecap deals 2 damage to target player.

card.name: Galewing Pterosaur
card.text: Flash Flying When Galewing Pterosaur enters, for each player, whisk away up to one other target creature that player controls. (Exile them. While each one is exiled, its owner may cast it for {2} rather than its mana cost.)

card.name: Gluttonous Hogtrap
card.text: Whenever Gluttonous Hogtrap attacks, you may have it consume. If you do, draw a card, then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. (To consume, sacrifice another creature or exile a creature card from your graveyard.)

card.name: Lure into the Maw
card.text: Counter target creature spell with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: Rust-Crowned Raptor
card.text: Menace, haste Players can't gain life. When Rust-Crowned Raptor enters, it deals 4 damage to up to one target planeswalker.
